overview:
Bohum Yeoun is IGAWorksâ€™ chief technology officer, and serves as the companyâ€™s board member. In this role, Mr. Yeoun is responsible for product development, service delivery and technology infrastructure.

Mr. Yeoun has incomparable expertise in billing solution design in multicultural environment. While he was working in Nexon, the leading developer and publisher of MMORPG, for over 10 years, he built various billing systems and coupon & point systems for its games in Japan, China and the US markets. He earned a bachelorâ€™s degree in System Design from Dong Seoul University.
